subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: ECAF promotes among Europe's farmers the soil management "best practice" aspects of Conservation Agriculture. With member associations in Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Moldova, Portugal, Russia, Slovakia, Spain Switzerland, Slovenia and Turkey, ECAF represents the interests of the majority of the European Union's cropped farmland.
relevant_communication:
- LIFE Agricarbon 08 ENV/E/000129 "Sustainable Agriculture in Carbon Arithmetics" 
- LIFE ClimAgri 13 ENV/ES/000541 "Best Agricultural practices for climate change: integrating strategies for mitigation and adaptation" 
- INSPIA proyect "European Index for Sustainable Agriculture" 
- SOLACE project "Solutions for improving Agroecosystem and Crop Efficiency for water and nutrient use"
